::: {#hero-heading}

I'm an Associate Professor in the Department of Political Science at Florida State University. My research has appeared in the *American Political Science Review*, the *American Journal of Political Science*, *Political Analysis*, and other peer-reviewed journals. I teach courses in American politics, comparative politics, and political methodology.

### Connect 

If you want to stay up-to-date on my work, please join my [email list](https://carlislerainey.ck.page/2074a1c37d).



I'm on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/carlislerainey) and [Mastodon](https://twitter.com/carlislerainey). I publicly version-control many of research projects and courses on [GitHub](https://github.com/carlislerainey). I upload my talks to [Speaker Deck](https://speakerdeck.com/carlislerainey). I'm on [Google Scholar](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=otXLf3wAAAAJ&hl=en), [ORCID](https://orcid.org/0000-0002-8728-4696) and [OSF](https://osf.io/ewbyc/).

:::
